snippet: The Olympic flame was handed to organizers of the Sochi Winter Olympics in a ceremony in Athens at the site of the first modern Summer Games.
abstract: Olympic flame is handed to organizers of the Sochi Winter Olympics in a ceremony in Athens at the site of the first modern Summer Games.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic flame was handed to organizers of the Sochi Winter Olympics in a ceremony in Athens at the site of the first modern Summer Games.
